name: Shoot em bounce
description:
Everyone know how bouncy balls are...
But how bouncy is your guns?

Shoot your enemies and get the highest score possible!

Controls:

SPACE - Jump

LMB - aim and shoot

ESC - pause

You're also moving in the look direction and regenerating 1 hp each 20 seconds without taking damage!

Assets taken:
Music: M.O.O.N. - Crystals (speed up ver. by us)
if this cause any issues with the rules, we can remove it from the game.
Cover image by K0STUR
Balls materials from Seamless Abstract Pack by Screaming Brain Studios
Floor and walls materials from Gridbox Prototype Materials by Ciathyz
Font - "Wander over Yonder"
